resources.string:
Terms of Service 
Ziki App is free to download and use. Ziki App is operated by Gozomo Kenya Limited. To download content from Ziki App users agree to abide by the terms of service of Ziki App and Gozomo Kenya Limited. 

Content download terms and conditions:
Subscription Service KES30 per week. You will be able to download three songs a week. If you want to download more than 3 songs you will be billed at KES30 per each additional song you download. 

Customer Support: 
email: ke@smshelp.info
Helpline:XXX XXX XXXX
